root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 1-a-2, translated into all languages

languages.language:
1. Annual UIS (usually launched the 4th quarter every year) and UOE survey (usually launched in June every year).
  2. Data mining is conducted periodically to correspond to the UIS data release schedule
Enquête annuelle de l'ISU (la dernière lancée en octobre 2019) et enquête de l'UOE (la dernière lancée en juin 2019).
